LanguageData.MRSKitR.label: MRS rifle conversion kit
LanguageData.MRSKitR.description: All the parts necessary to convert an phanter-C modular carbine to the rifle configuration. In order to reconfigure an already-configured panther Modular Rifle System, you'll need to disassemble it to the carbine, then assemble with the parts you prefer.
LanguageData.MRSKitM.label: MRS DMR conversion kit
LanguageData.MRSKitM.description: All the parts necessary to convert an phanter-C modular carbine to the Designated Marksman's Rifle configuration. In order to reconfigure an already-configured panther Modular Rifle System, you'll need to disassemble it to the carbine, then assemble with the parts you prefer.
LanguageData.MRSKitS.label: MRS LMG conversion kit
LanguageData.MRSKitS.description: All the parts necessary to convert an phanter-C modular carbine to the Light Machine Gun configuration. In order to reconfigure an already-configured panther Modular Rifle System, you'll need to disassemble it to the carbine, then assemble with the parts you prefer.
